Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, varying feed pressure up to 4.0 bar
Other Information.Additional Info: Enhanced adsorption due to aniline as a selective adsorption site.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, varying feed pressure up to 4.0 bar
Other Information.Additional Info: Restricted diffusion due to steric hindrance and phase transformation to Cm.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale and selective adsorption

Experimental Validation.Method: Single-gas permeance experiments, Rietveld refinement of XRD patterns, QCM measurements
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Propylene/propane selectivity: up to 85, Permeance: Not Reported

Other Information.Additional Info: Aniline modification promotes phase transition from I_43 m to Cm, enhancing propylene/propane separation performance.
